Server.Name: Tongo A21
Server.Description:
Available TongoMod 3.0, all features are included.
- New recipes - New machines - Over 300 quests - Include quest documentation - Craft any book, schematic or magazine - Dismantle any ammo to get all components - Farm as alpha 19 - Backpack with up to 84 slots - HUD changes - Modification in the biomes - New progression system - All English and Spanish translation - New mods, tools, consumables, minerals, materials etc..
And much more in TongoMod 3.0
